info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford, southeastern Polk, north central Spartanburg and northwestern Cherokee Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Forest City, or 5 miles west of Chesnee, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chesnee, Cowpens National Battlefield, Harris, Fingerville, Henrietta and Caroleen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
